IX.iii.1.l.1
.f
.
Value of Room and Board
Count the fair value of room and board furnished to a claimant if the room and board are furnished in lieu of money or services provided by the beneficiary.
Exception
:Â  The value of room and board is not countable if it is furnished gratuitously.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I - Counting Specific Types of Income
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I
